missionstate.description: Você deve dar use nos Large Pile of Various Bones para juntar 50 pontos. Assim que tiver 50 pontos, volte ao npc Sandomo.
Você concluiu a missão Pile Bones em Lower Roshamuul.
Pontos: |STATE|

You killed all 10000 Minotaurs.

You killed all 9000 Necromancers.

You killed all 6666 Demons.
You killed |STORAGE:65029|/10000 Medusas.
You killed all 1500 Hellhounds.

You killed all 500 Undead Dragons.
You killed |STORAGE:65031|/25000 Nightmares.
You killed all 700 Ghastly Dragons.
You killed |STORAGE:65032|/10000 Lizards.
You killed all 4000 Drakens.
You killed |STORAGE:65033|/10000 Medusas.
You killed all 10000 Medusas.
You killed |STORAGE:65034|/10000 Grim Reapers.
You killed all 10000 Grim Reapers.
You killed |STORAGE:65035|/25000 The Furys.
You killed all 25000 The Furys.
You killed |STORAGE:65036|/35000 The Nightmares.
You killed all 35000 The Nightmares.
You killed |STORAGE:65037|/50000 The Lizards.
You killed all 50000 The Lizards.
Now you are ready to meet one of the Djinn leaders.\nRemeber they only answer, if you greet them with the secret word: DJANNI'HAH
You have joined the Efreet Faction.
Ubaid wants you to meet with their general Baa'leal.
Baa'leal want you find the supply thief in Carlin.
Head back to Baa'leal and report about the supply thief.
Baa'leal sends you to Alesar to continue with the missions.
Alesar wants you to sneak into Ashta'daramai and to steal the gemstone.
You have founded the gemstone, head back to Alesar.
Alesar wants you to speak with Malor about a new mission.
Malor want you to retrieve a lamp from the Orc King in Ulderek's Rock.
Now you need to, sneak into the Blue Djinn fortress, and place it in Gabel's personal bedchamber.\nGo to the secret entrance to the Blue Djinn fortress, and take the stairs all the way to the top.
You successfully changed the lamp, now sneak out and report to Malor.
You have completed all missions. Malor allows you now to trade with his people.
You have joined the Marid Faction.
Ubaid wants you to meet with Bo'ques.
Bo'ques wants you to find a cookbook with exotic recipes.
Bring the cookbook to Bo'ques and he will reward you for your help.
Bo'ques said that Fa'hradin might have some work to you.
Continue your mission with Fa'hradin.
Fa'hradin wants you retrive a spy report from their spy which like cheese in the Green Djinn fortress.\n Also he clearly said to remeber this word: PIEDPIPER
Bring the spy report back to Fa'hradin.
Fa'hradin is impressed about your work. So he told Gabel and you'll have to talk with Gabel.
Continue your mission with Gabel.
Gabel wants you travel to Ulderek's Rock and talk with the King of Orcs.
Now you need to, sneak into the Green Djinn fortress, and place it in Malor's personal bedchamber.\nGo to the secret entrance to the Green Djinn fortress, and take the stairs all the way to the top.
You successfully changed the lamp, now sneak out and report to Gabel.
You have completed all missions. Gabel allows you now to trade with his people.
You have completed Demon Oak Quest! Oldrak is really thankful for your help.
Enter the room to the left and open the box.
Now go talk to Rapanaio about your first Mission.
Fish a mechanical fish in the sewers of Yalahar. you will need to use nails as bait for those fish.
Bring the mechanical fish back to Rapanaio.
Continue your mission with Rapanaio.
You need to bring 10 vials of Rum to Rapanaio.
Continue your mission with Rapanaio.
Get a vial of Fruit Juice and bring it to Rapanaio.
Continue your mission with Rapanaio.
Go to Scutty, he is located south-east of the Technomancer and ask him about Machine.
Scutty wants you to hit 6 Carrion Worms. Also he warned you that, if you hit a Drilling Worm. You need to pay him.
Report to Scutty about your mission and he will reward you as a thank you for your service.
Now bring the crate back to Rapanaio.
Continue your mission with Rapanaio.
Rapanaio wants you to talk with Mortimer about the Nautical Map.
Mortimer mentioned that, the map is burried under sand somewhere east between two mossy stones.
Bring the map to Rapanaio.
Continue your mission with Rapanaio.
Rapanaio wants you to meet him downstairs.
Continue your mission with Rapanaio.
Rapanaio wants you to slay the Evil Mastermind.
Now head back to Rapanaio and tell him about your mission.
Now to getting your reward from the King Tibianus, you'll have to bring him the fan club membership.
You have completed all missions.
You have completed this mission.
You have completed In Service Of Yalahar Quest.
You have to defeated all enemies in this mode.
You have defeated all enemies in this mode.
You have to defeated all enemies in this mode.
You have defeated all enemies in this mode.
You have to defeated all enemies in this mode.
You have defeated all enemies in this mode.
You have to find the seal in order to complete it.
You have found the seal.
You have to find the seal in order to complete it.
You have found the seal.

mission.name: Seal 5: The seal of truth path

missionstate.description: You have to find the seal in order to complete it.
You have found the seal.
You have to find the seal in order to complete it.
You have found the seal.
You have to find the seal in order to complete it.
You have found the seal.
You have to find the seal in order to complete it.
You have found the seal.

mission.name: Seal 7: The Kiss of the Banshee Queen

missionstate.description: You have to find the seal in order to complete it.
You have found the seal.
You have completed this mission.
You have faced the 6 Demon's of hell.
You have completed getting through the Behemoth's.
Lazaran told you about the stolen holy skull also suggested to look for it in the orc fortress north of the mountain.
You found the holy skull! You almost overlooked it in the large pile of bones, but that must be it. Bring it back to Lazaran.
You brought the holy skull back to Lazaran and it's safe again. If it's not stolen again, that is.
You have a strange skull and are supposed to show him the world. Hmm. If you want to show him as much as possible, you better go up somewhere really high. Why not start with the Edron Academy Tower?
Now head to Ab'dendriel tower near the boat.
Now head to Femor Hills tower.
Now head to Darashia temple.
Now head to Ankrahmun at the highest pyramid.
Now head to Port Hope, the western watch tower.
Now head to Liberty Bay, Ivory Circle.
Now head to Yalahar shopping tower.
Now head to Svargrond Watchtower.
Now head to Carlin castle in the western tower.
Now return to Lazaran and give him the skull.
Lazaran wants you talk with a priest named Ulala.
Ulala wants you to make Krunus happy by dancing the Krunus dance and Krunus will support our great hunt!
You have completed the dance, Krunus should be pleased.\nHead back to Ulala and talk about your new mission.
Ulala wants you to collect 5 teeth of green men, 5 skin of horned ones and 5 skin of snakemen for sacrifice to Pandor.
Ulala is grateful about your work and ready to give you another mission.
We need make sure Fasuon is on our side. Please find great crystal of Fasuon in the top of mountain and pray there for his support!
Fasuon is supporting. Now head back to Ulala.
Ulala saw the light of Fasuon and he is thankful.
Ulala is grateful for your help and sends you back to Lazaran to talk about your mission.

Lazaran has asked you for a Pot of Beer, in his own words. You can then fill the pot with this beer and return to complete this mission and if you gather your Tribal Crest return to Cael and you will be rewarded.
You have completed all the missions.
Hugo has hidden the path.
You have founded the hidden path and made it to next level.
The first Challenge is a Matching color game. You must use the switches to match the 4 colors into their designated spots.
The walls will protect you against the monster. In order to complete this challenge you have to flick all switches in right order and enter the teleport fast as possible.
You have completed this mission.
You'll have to find the book of the lost heros.
Now you have to solve the tic-tac-toe puzzle, by using the help of the book.
You have completed this mission.

To start the Dream Room, you need to make 4 sacrifice. There are 4 spots. The north will be a Life Ring. The south a Death Ring. Go to the west and go up and move the switch to make the well fill with Poison and turn the electricity on. Now on the West pour water.

Step into a teleporter, this, according to the tibian history is when you start to dreamwalk. The paths you will find throughout the way are places who are called Dreampaths to the Dream Realm. As you are asleep, the monsters in there are just decorative and won't do you any harm.
At the Dream Realm talk to your leader from the Brotherhood of Bones or the Nightmare Knights, they will have additional missions for you.
You have completed this mission.
Your mission is to collect 500 Demonic Essence.
You have completed this mission.
Your mission is to collect 1000 more Demonic Essences.
You have completed this mission.
Your mission is to collect 1500 more Demonic Essences.
You have completed this mission.
You have completed Demon Helmet Quest.
You have founded the Helmet Pice.
You have founded the Helmet Ornament.
You have founded the Gem Holder.
You have founded the Right Horn.
You have founded the Left Horn.
You have founded the Damaged Helmet.
You have founded the Helmet Adornment.
You have put the pices together and recreated the Helmet of the Ancient.
You have completed Cartel Helmet Quest.
You have completed Cartel Armor Quest.
You have completed Cartel Legs Quest.
You have completed Cartel Boots Quest.
You have completed Cartel Shield and Quest.
Your first mission for becoming a recognized trader is to bring the traveling salesman Rashid a Deer Trophy.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Your mission is to get the package from Willard the weapon dealer at Edron.
Willard forgot to pick it up from Snake Eye at Outlaw Camp. So he wants you to go and pick it up from Snake Eye.
Now bring back the package to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid wants you to pick his special order from Miraia in Darashia. But you have to be quick, Scarab cheese can rot really fast in high temperature.
Now quickly bring back the Scarab cheese to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid have ordered a special elven vase from Briasol in Ab'Dendriel. He asks you to buy it from Briasol and bring it back.\nBut you should be carefully, since the vase is very fragile.
Now carefully bring the vase back to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
This time, Rashid is testing your trading skills to buy a Crimson Sword from Uzgod. But it have to be less than 400 gold coins and the quality has to be perfect.
Now bring the sword back to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid wants you to bring him a Goldfish Bowl.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid has declare you as one of his recognized traders, and now you are able to trade with him anytime..
You have joined the Postman guild.
First travel with Captain Bluebear's ship from Thais to Carlin.
Head to Fermor Hills and travel with Uzon to Edron.
Travel with Captain Seahorse to the city of Venore.
Find the technomancer Brodrosch and travel with him to the Isle of Cormaya.
Now report back to Kevin about your mission.
You have finished this mission.
Kevin wants you to repair a broken mailbox top of Folda mountain.
Now return to Kevin and ask for a advancement.
You have finished this mission.
Your mission is to deliver a bill for a Magician Hat, to a famous magician.
Now return to Kevin and report about your mission.
You have finished this mission.
The Postman office are running low on bones in the Post Officer's Fund and need you to collect 20 bones. After ask Kevin for a advancement.
You have finished this mission.
Your mission is to deliver a present to Dermot on Fibula.
Now return to Kevin and report about your mission.
You have finished this mission.
Kevin wants you to ask Hugo for new uniforms.
Now return to Kevin and report about your mission.
Now he wants you to ask Talphion for new dress patterns.
Now return to Kevin and report about your mission.
Now he wants you to talk with Queen Eloise in Carlin.
Now return to Kevin and report about your mission.
Now he wants you head to Noodles in Thais and let him SNIFF some samples.
Now return to Kevin and report about your mission.
Now return to Hugo and talk about the new dress then you have finished this mission.
Hugo told Kevin that he needs the measurements of all of the Post Officers. So talk with Ben, Lokur, Dove, Liane, Chrystal and Olrik about measurements.
Now return to Kevin and report about your mission.
You have finished this mission.
Kevin told you that the mail courier Waldo is missing, and that you need to find him, or at least his posthorn.
You have finished this mission.
This time Kevin wants you to deliver some letters to Santa Claus on Vega.
Now return to Kevin and report about your mission.
You have finished this mission.
Kevin gave you a letter to deliver to Markwin.
Now return to Kevin and report about your mission.
You have finished this mission.
